resources.string: Congratulations. Now, enjoy your free time.

USA is a country comprising 50 states, a federal district, five major self-governing territories, and various possessions. At 3.8 million square miles (9.8 million km2), the United States is the world\'s third or fourth largest country by total area[d] and is slightly smaller than the entire continent of Europe, which is 3.9 million square miles (10.1 million km2). The capital is Washington, D.C., and the most populous city is New York City.
